basic.description: A study of texts on both sides of the controversial boundary between the Middle Ages and the Renaissance. Texts are chosen to trace the development of a particular category of writing, such as courtly literature, religious writing, drama, or writing by women. Some texts are read in Middle English; language instruction is provided.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: 15th & 16th Century Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement: ENGL110 OR ENGL112 OR ENGL160 OR ENGL1U##
